name: anonexam-platform
description: Anonymous Encrypted Online Exam Platform - Full Stack Application

scripts.build: npm run build:contracts && npm run build:frontend
scripts.build:static: npm run build:contracts && npm run build:frontend:static
scripts.build:frontend:static: cd action/frontend && GITHUB_ACTIONS=true npm run build
scripts.dev: npm run dev:contracts & npm run dev:frontend
